column1: Must NOT contain any slashes. "news" makes the blog accessible from domain.com/news. Leave blank for default value.
column2: Must NOT contain any slashes. "news" makes the blog accessible from domain.com/news. Leave blank for default value.

column1: If enabled, additional "Short Content Field" is taken instead of truncated main post.

column1: Number of post to display in the RSS feed.
